name: Dungeon Driftin'
description:
Your deep within a dungeon, with nothing but a mine cart. Can you escape the dungeon? Drift into enemies and projectiles to destroy them! Avoid obstacles by dodging and jumping over them! 

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

SHIFT (hold)  to drift


Music:

Keith Jones: https://soundcloud.com/kaje22
